article.headline: Samford 84, Austin Peay 68
article.story: BIRMINGHAM, Ala. (AP) -- Travis Peterson scored 22 points and Randall Gulina added 21, leading Samford to a 84-68 victory over Austin Peay in Ohio Valley Conference play on Saturday. J. Robert Merritt also reached double figures for the Bulldogs (14-5, 10-2) with 19 points. The trio grabbed five rebounds a piece. The Bulldogs have won 11 of their last 12 games and grabbed their fourth consecutive conference victory Saturday. Samford had a 46-24 halftime lead, but allowed the Governors to recover from their 34.5 percent shooting in the first half. The Bulldogs led by as many as 33 points in the second half, but still allowed Austin Peay to outscore them 44-38. Landon Shipley led the Governors (11-10, 6-6) with 15 points. Zac Schlader added 11 and Fernandez Lockett had 10 points and a team-high five rebounds. The Bulldogs held Austin Peay to 43.1 percent shooting overall, while hitting 55.8 percent of their shots.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).
